title: Garbanzo Beans🥥 Sundal | 250th post 🍧😃💖 | Chickpea Sundal | Temple Prasadam |Special | Senagala gugillu
content:
Snack : Chickpea Sundal 😋 Servings: 3 Hi Everyone, This is my 250th post 😱 can’t wait to share my happiness with all of you, I thank each and every person who’s been supporting and showering love ❤️ to my blog. Follow my blog and don’t miss the updates in social media, links shared at the end of this post. Sundal is a common snack recipe, we usually prepared at home and will offer to God in temple and gives as Prasadam. It’s a famous authentic recipe in south India 🇮🇳 so easy to make a perfect light snack packed with healthiness and taste too. You can checkout my other Sundal , link given below 👇 Black eyed beans Sundal Duration: 5 minutes + soaking time 9 hours + cooking time 15 mins Ingredients:
  • Garbanzo Beans / chickpeas/ Senagallu - 160 gms
  • Green chillies - 2
  • Turmeric Powder - 1/4 tsp
  • Salt - 1 1/2 tsp ( to cook beans and seasoning)
  • Fresh shredded coconut 🥥- 2 Tb sp
  • Oil - 1 tsp
  • Mustard seeds - 1/4 tsp
  • Cumin seeds - 1/2 tsp
  • Urad dal / Skinless Black Gram - 1/2 tsp
  • Dry Red chilly - 1
  • Hing / Asafoetida - 1/4 tsp
  • Curry leaves - 5
Procedure: Cook Garbanzo Beans:
  • Wash Garbanzo Beans twice under running water
  • Add fresh water to soak beans for atleast 9 hours
  • When beans soaked well, cook them in pressure cooker along with (1/2 tsp) salt and pinch of turmeric powder
  • Cook them for 3 whistles and turn off heat
  • Let the pressure goes down, open lid and strain water by using colander
  • Cooked Garbanzo Beans are ready to use in sundal
Coconut Paste:
  • In a mini mixer grinder add shredded coconut and green chillies
  • Blend it to make smooth paste
  • Keep aside
Process of Sundal:
  • Heat a skillet pan or sauce pan over medium heat
  • Add oil, mustard seeds, cumin seeds, urad dal, curry leaves, Let them splutter
  • Then add Hing , turmeric powder & dry Red chilly . Mix well
  • Next add grounded coconut paste and sauté a minute
  • Finally add cooked Garbanzo Beans and give it a toss or gently sauté 3-5 minutes
  • Tada! Fresh and healthy Sundal is ready to serve
  • Serving suggestion: you can sprinkle lemon juice and grated carrot or chopped cilantro ( optional ) but I’m sure it’s definitely a good choice. Do try and enjoy 😉
  • Happy cooking and Have a blissful day 🙂
